block.p: BLUESTONE-Jeannette. On August 8, 2000. Beloved wife of Dr. Leon Bluestone. Loving mother of Terry Ann, Renee and mother-inlaw of Jeffrey Loving and David Schneider. Cherished grandmother of Loren and Olivia. Dear sister of Charlotte Picot, Charles and Paul Bialo, dear aunt and friend to many. We will always love you and miss you. Services Thursday at 11:15AM at ''The Riverside,'' 76 Street and Amsterdam Avenue.
